product_name: SealLine Large HP Map Case - 22" x 15.5"
long_description: The large-size, watertight SealLine HP map case is perfect for adventure racing, cycling and boating. It offers PVC-free visibility, versatility and durability. Keep your maps and trail notes dry with this waterproof case, sized to accommodate Canadian Hydrographic and ISS charts. High-performance map case is built with a rip-and-stick, roll-down closure for waterproof submersible integrity. Trimmed with lash tabs to connect to kayak deck webbing or backpack. Pliable, transparent urethane construction lets you navigate in any weather. Interior dimensions: 21 x 14.5 in.
short_description: The large-size, watertight SealLine HP map case is perfect for adventure racing, cycling and boating. It offers PVC-free visibility, versatility and durability.
